summary: Added weekly model sync automation and model catalog verification in health endpoint
details: Introduced weekly model sync script and scheduled GitHub workflow, updated package scripts for model validation/sync, corrected health-check smoke model to Gemini 2.0, added model catalog verification to dashboard /api/health route, and aligned dashboard provider probe models with current catalog.
impact: High - Adds recurring model drift detection and exposes model catalog integrity in runtime health telemetry
